action-get.description: Get a specific action by ID. Returns the action configuration including all steps and their trigger conditions.
action-get.title: Get action

actions-get-all.description: Get all actions in the project. Actions are reusable event definitions that can combine multiple trigger conditions (page views, clicks, form submissions) into a single trackable event for use in insights and funnels.
actions-get-all.title: Get all actions

action-create.description: Create a new action in the project. Actions define reusable event triggers based on page views, clicks, form submissions, or custom events. At least one step is required.
action-create.title: Create action

action-update.description: Update an existing action by ID. Can update name, description, steps, tags, and Slack notification settings.
action-update.title: Update action

action-delete.description: Delete an action by ID. The action will no longer appear in lists but historical data is preserved.
action-delete.title: Delete action
